one.description: Familiarize yourself with Qubit placement in this mission
one.message: Congratulation, you completed the first mission! On the road to being a great Quantumist.

two.description: Since electrons repel each other, it is possible to invert the polarity of qubits by putting one qubit in diagonal of another.

three.description: Let's build a more complex logic gate. By having many inputs joined into one output, a majority gate can be built. The output corresponds to the value of the major input.

four.fullname: More complex logic gates: AND gate
four.description: Let's now build another logic gate: the AND gate. The output Z's value is 1 when both of the input A and B's values are 1. Otherwise, the output Z's value is 0.
